email.length: Email must contain at least 8 characters.
email.letter: Email must contain at least one letter.
email.digit: Email must contain at least one digit.
email.special: Email must contain at least one special character !, @, #, $, %, ^, &, *.

password.length: Password must contain at least 8 characters.
password.letter: Password must contain at least one letter.
password.digit: Password must contain at least one digit.
password.special: Password must contain at least one special character !, @, #, $, %, ^, &, *.
